document_data.name: Eldura Moreen
document_data.home: [[Hall of Wonder (Utter East)|Hall of Wonder]], [[Utter East]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''Eldura Moreen''' was a great inventor and [[bloodforge]] mage in the [[Utter East]] during the time of the [[Bloodforge Wars]] ([[648 DR|648]]â€“[[657 DR]]).

Eldura worked tirelessly within the [[Hall of Wonder (Utter East)|Hall of Wonder]] to discover the essence of the bloodforge. But the leader of the [[Legendary Campaign]] resolved that no-one should know the secret of what the [[god]]s had wrought, and went there to put an end to Eldura's quest in a bloodforge battle.
